name: GitHub Jenkins pipeline setup script
description: Creates a Jenkins pipeline for a GitHub Repository

inputs.name: AWS Access Key ID
inputs.description: Access key ID used to sign programmatic requests to AWS

inputs.name: AWS secret access key
inputs.description: Secret access key used to sign programmatic requests to AWS

inputs.name: Docker username
inputs.description: Docker username for logging in to the registry where the images will be pushed. Only matters when using a custom Docker registry

inputs.name: Docker password
inputs.description: Docker password for logging in to the registry where the images will be pushed. Only matters when using a custom Docker registry

inputs.name: Tags for the AWS EKS cluster
inputs.description: Additional tags for creating the EKS cluster. Format: Key=string,Contact=john.doe@eficode.com,Department=example-hki

inputs.name: Grafana password
inputs.description: Strong password to be used for authenticating to the Grafana frontend available at grafana-[PUBLIC ADDRESS]. The default username is admin. Required if using Grafana.
